data.text: @WillSloanEsq This special Academy citation will be nicknamed "The Humpty" in recognition of a historical oversight
@jessehawken Wonder Wheel was completely ignored last year despite making over a million dollars at the box office. Hard not to conclude that the Academy is out of touch.

@WillSloanEsq It was this film that triggered the academy into action. For too long, AMPAS has overlooked the careers of such populist entertainers as Woody Allen. That all changes this year when A RAINY DAY IN NE--
